Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: The administration view of the traditional workplace provides graphical interfaces for most of administrative tasks. Here you can explore it's structure and find general information about the different tasks. To get more detailed information on a single task, please look for special topics on the task.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: The administration view provides graphical interfaces for most administrative tasks. Get on overview on it.
